name: app_database
desc:
lib/global_data/database/app_database.dart
Database configuration using Floor Object Relation Mapping

name: addCallback
desc: Adds a database Callback to the builder.

name: addMigrations
desc: Adds migrations to the builder.

name: build
desc: Creates the database and initializes it.

name: databaseBuilder
desc:
Creates a database builder for a persistent database.
Once a database is built, you should keep a reference to it and re-use it.

name: inMemoryDatabaseBuilder
desc:
Creates a database builder for an in memory database.
Information stored in an in memory database disappears when the process is killed.
Once a database is built, you should keep a reference to it and re-use it.

name: AppDatabase
desc: Main application database class using Floor ORM

name: chat_repository
desc:
Chat Repository - Interface to LLM for conversational capabilities. Currently, a quantized deepsee-r1-8b hosted
with ollama is used:
ollama serve
ollama run deepseek-r1:8b
Manages communication with a local LLM (Large Language Model) server
for providing mental health support through CBT (Cognitive Behavioral Therapy)
techniques. Handles message sending, streaming responses, and error handling.

name: sendMessage
desc: Sends a message to the LLM and returns a single response

name: streamMessage
desc: Sends a message to the LLM and streams responses in real-time

name: colleague_relation
desc:
Duolympix has a feature inspired by ‘达目标’ (yoobingo @ http://www.yoobingo.com/) where
users can form colleague relationships to support/supervise each other in completing quests.

name: ColleagueRelation
desc: Database entity for colleague-quest relationships

name: ColleagueRelation
desc: Constructor for creating a colleague-quest relationship

name: colleagueId
desc: ID of the colleague (user) in this relationship

name: questId
desc: ID of the quest associated with this colleague relationship

Duolympix has a feature inspired by ‘达目标’ (yoobingo @ http://www.yoobingo.com/) where
users can form colleague relationships to support/supervise each other in completing quests.

desc: Retrieves all colleague relationships involving a specific user

name: insertColleagueRelation
desc: Inserts a new colleague relationship into the database

name: comment
desc:
Duolympix has a feature inspired by ‘达目标’ (yoobingo @ http://www.yoobingo.com/) where
there's a public forum for users to discuss quest-related tips. Here, we implement a simple
comment section.

name: username

comment section.

name: injection_container
desc:
This file configures and initializes the app's dependency injection system using
the get_it and injectable libraries. Dependency injection is a design pattern
where objects receive their dependencies through constructors, factory methods,
or properties rather than creating them internally, improving testability and maintainability.

name: configureDependencies
desc: Initializes the dependency injection container

name: getIt
desc: Global dependency injection container instance

name: main
desc:
This is the core startup function of the application,
responsible for initializing the dependency injection system, database connection,
and configuring the overall architecture of the application.
It adopts the Provider state management pattern and
the dependency inversion principle to ensure loose coupling and testability among components.

desc: Checks if the quest is time-based (uses duration parameters)

desc: Maximum allowed duration for flexible time-based quests

name: minDuration
desc: Minimum acceptable duration for flexible time-based quests

name: targetDistance
desc: Target distance for distance-based quests (e.g., 5 kilometers)

name: targetDuration
desc: Exact target duration for time-based quests (e.g., 30 minutes)

name: title
desc: Display name of the quest

name: xp_investment
desc:
Duolympix has a feature inspired by ‘达目标’ (yoobingo @ http://www.yoobingo.com/) where
users can use money (in our case XPs) to support each other in completing quests.
